circumstances: Shortly after takeoff from Kathmandu Airport, while in initial climb, the single engine airplane went out of control and crashed in flames in a cornfield. The aircraft was destroyed by a post crash fire and all five occupants were killed, among them Louise Hillary and Belinda Hillary aged 16, spouse and daughter of the Alpinist Edmund Hillary.
probable_cause: It was determined that the pilot failed to realize that a ground lock pin on one of the ailerons was still in place and not remove prior to departure.
